attributes.action: change the maintenance grant system for students so it is fair to parents who stay together
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The student maintenance grant is awarded on the basis of the household income of the parent with whom the student lives. Thus a child could live with a mother on £20k p.a. and receive a full grant, even if he has a millionaire father who regularly gives him money but happens to live apart from the mother. This is grossly unfair to married/co-habiting parents and their student children.
